## Introduction

This week will introduce definition and types of machine learning as well as the framework and metrics of supervised machine learning.

## Learning Objectives

By the end of this week, you will be able to:

1. Understand three types for machine learning.
2. Appreciate *Garbage in, Garbage out* theorem.
3. Understand the framework of supervised learning.
4. Understand the common metrics of supervised learning.
